## SendableEthersLiquity.sendSTAR() method

Send STAR tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | any | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | any | Amount of STAR to send. |
